Rainbow Calendar
Hi! Welcome to Rainbow Calendar
Choose the app language
Welcome back

app logo
Enter your (nick)name, how do you want to be addressed.
Name
Which theme do you prefer?
Transmasculine mode, masculine terms will be used, and potentially triggering topics will be avoided. Pregnancy won\'t be ever mentioned.
Man mode, congrats gigachad, you unlocked real transmed man mode! You won\'t see inclusive tucute bullshit!
Woman mode, Feminine terms will be used.
Neutral mode, gender-neutral terms will be used, suitable for non-binary, questioning, and other users.
Home
Account
Add
Calendar
Choose a most fitting option
I have recently started having shark weeks and I\'m not thinking about getting pregnant. (version for minors, adults choose the last option)
I have recently started having periods and I\'m not thinking about getting pregnant. (version for minors, adults choose the last option)
I have recently started having shark weeks.(version for minors, adults choose the last option)
I\'m in a relationship where pregnancy is not possible, or I\'m unable to get pregnant for another reason.
I\'m a trans guy planning on taking T someday.
I\'m a trans masculine-leaning person planning on taking T someday.
I\'m in FTM transition at the start of T or micro-dosing, and I want to track the disappearance of shark week.
I\'m gender non-conforming (GNC) or I simply don\'t like the feminine aesthetics of similar apps.
I\'m trans in some way, but I don\'t plan on taking HRT.
I\'m a virgin or not sexually active at the moment, for any reason.
I\'ve been on T for some time, I don\'t experience shark weeks anymore, I want shot reminders
Choose your gender/app mode, there will be more detailed modes on the next screen. You can always change these settings.
Choose your age group.
If you want to, enter your birthday, (you\'ll get birthday wishes). Advised if you\'re a minor, the age setting will change automatically.
